#summary Visualization partin obvious toolkit.

= Introduction =

This parts describes the Visualization abstract class and its associated classes in obvious toolkit. 


= Visualization (abstract class) =

Unlike the data model, Visualization is not an interface, but implemented as an abstract class. To build, a new obvious visualization instance, it is needed to provide an obvious data structure instance (among Table, Network and Tree<Node, Edge>), a predicate (can be null), a visualization technic name (can be null) and a map of parameters (can be null).
